com.salimov.yurii.service.data.interfaces

Interface ContentService<T extends Content,E extends java.lang.Number>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - entity type, extends Content.
    E - entity id type, extends Number.
    All Superinterfaces:
    DataService<T,E>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ArticleService, CategoryService, CompanyService, SectionService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArticleServiceImpl, CategoryServiceImpl, CompanyServiceImpl, ContentServiceImpl, SectionServiceImpl

    public interface ContentService<T extends Content,E extends java.lang.Number>
extends DataService<T,E>
    The interface of the service layer, describes a set of methods for working with objects of Content class or subclass.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yurii.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    Content, DataService, ArticleService, CategoryService, CompanyService, SectionService
